page.description: In this 90 minute video, Dan Bricklin walks you through the process of building a web and mobile application that can capture and store images in a SQL database.

description.p: You begin the course by setting up a SQL table, which you then use to build a browser application. The application is then further built to work on a mobile device, and to access a phone camera. The pace is slow enough so that you can build the application along with the video, without needing to stop and rewind. If you have a second monitor, or a tablet, we suggest that you view the video on that while following along in Alpha Anywhere to build the application.

section.description: If you prefer written instruction instead of a video, a [complete transcript] with step-by-step instructions is available for download.
